law.catch_line: In order to implement the Green Shores Program, the Department may:...

text.section:
In order to implement the Green Shores Program, the Department may:
Enter into contractual agreements with other State agencies, local governments, nonprofit corporations, and private citizens who receive payments or grants;
Set priorities by watersheds for the dissemination of grants and payments; and
Adopt regulations.
Any contractual agreement that the Department enters into under the Green Shores Program shall specify the terms of the grant or payment.
